title: Sidewall, 1895–1905
creditline: Gift of Edith and Maude Wetmore
description: Full width. Simulation of brocade of Louis XVI period. Wide and narrow stripes of blue and pink, and alternating large and small serpentine vines with flowers. Paper embossed with transverse ribbing. Printed in blue, green, yellow and pink on white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1895–1905.
1895–1905. Machine-printed on textured paper. Gift of Edith and Maude Wetmore. 1939-45-17-a,b.
